data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gilligan, Todd M., Matthews, Deborah L., Miller, Jacqueline Y. (2018): Two new species of Eucosmini from the Bahamas (Lepidoptera: Tortricidae). Zootaxa 4378 (2): 265-268, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4378.2.5|7 occurrences
